posts.post_content: an intresting fact. when i first started playing i remember seeing that crazy misprint of that "blue" Hurricane that was Summer Magic/Edgar (Revised reprinting). I heard all but 70 booster boxes were distroyed and about only 10-12 rares from summer magic exsist today :) The rare Cursed Rack from that set are like 400 bucks and the "Antiquities" set is like 2 bucks :)
posts.html:

I find it odd that people rate Wind Storm higher than Hurricane. One of the rare green direct damage spell, Hurricane wipes the sky clean and deals damage to your opponent. Green is the color of massive mana, this might even kill off opponent faster than a red X spell.  
  
4.5/5 for being green
